member.name: M:SitecoreDynamicPlaceholders.Helpers.SitecoreHelper.DynamicPlaceholder(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The name of the placeholder. Must be a non-empty string.
Specifies how many placeholders Sitecore renders. Must be a non-negative number.
The upper limit of the number of dynamically generated placeholders. Must be a non-negative number.
A number used to calculate a starting value of a generated placeholder key suffix. Must be a non-negative number.
member.returns: The HTML of the dynamic placeholder.

member.name: M:SitecoreDynamicPlaceholders.Helpers.SitecoreHelper.DynamicPlaceholder(System.String,System.Web.Mvc.TagBuilder,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.param: The name of the placeholder. Must be a non-empty string.
The TagBuilder object that specifies the HTML tag that will wrap each count of all dynamically generated placeholders.
Specifies how many placeholders Sitecore renders. Must be a non-negative number.
The upper limit of the number of dynamically generated placeholders. Must be a non-negative number.
A number used to calculate a starting value of a generated placeholder key suffix. Must be a non-negative number.
member.returns: The HTML of the dynamic placeholder.

Specifies how many placeholders Sitecore renders. Must be a non-negative number.
The upper limit of the number of dynamically generated placeholders. Must be a non-negative number.

The upper limit of the number of dynamically generated placeholders. Must be a non-negative number.
